title: H is for Hawk - function of statement

content.prompt: In context, the statement “Believe me it doesn’t” (paragraph 4, sentence 12) primarily serves to

choices.label: dismiss a common objection to the author’s views
acknowledge limits to the usefulness of the author’s approach
question the credibility of most hawk trainers
reinforce the author’s authority as an expert in her field

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
